snippet: DIAZ--Rosa. The members of the Dept. of Pharmacology at Weill Cornell Medicine extend our heartfelt sympathy to Lissett Checo, our devoted departmental secretary, on the death of her beloved mother, Rosa Diaz, after a long illness. Lissett has been a supportive and loving daughter, and the entire department is saddened by her loss. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DIAZ--Rosa.
